card.description_intro: You are about to sign a message with your wallet to authenticate yourself and authorize
card.description_signature_purpose: only for identification and permission checks
card.description_no_transaction: No transaction will be sent, and no funds will be moved.
card.info_world: The signed message proves that you control the wallet associated with this world.
card.info_parcel: The signed message proves that you control the wallet associated with this parcel.

footer.info: This is an off-chain signature used for authentication.

header.title: Server Logs Authentication
header.description: Sign to view real-time logs from your server-side scene

card.title: Authorize log streaming
card.description_intro: You are about to sign a message with your wallet to authenticate yourself and authorize
card.description_signature_purpose: only for identification and permission checks
card.description_no_transaction: No transaction will be sent, and no funds will be moved.
card.info_message: The signed message proves that you control the wallet associated with this world.

footer.info: After signing, logs will stream to your terminal in real-time.
footer.hint: Press CTRL+C in the terminal to stop streaming.

success.title: Authentication Successful!
success.message: Logs are now streaming to your terminal.
success.hint: You can close this window and return to your terminal.
